name: Girls salon dress up games
description:
OMG! It's hairstyling time!
Join the OMG! Girls in their Hair Salon for a fun hairstyling experience. Create cool hairstyles and haircuts, make the hair curly, frizzy or straight, grow it, cut it, wash it, dry it and color it in amazing combinations, add accessories and create a unique look for each character.
Enjoy the diverse worlds our characters have to offer and their unique hair colors, gradients, special fashion items and accessories: necklaces, earrings, hair accessories, glasses, tops and more.

This is another hit from Pazu, the publisher of Girls Hair Salon, Girls Nail Salon, Makeup Girls and many others!
Pazu offers a variety of fun, casual and creativity games for you.

We invite you to try out Pazu games and discover a wonderful brand for games, with a huge selection of games.
For more information, visit our website: https://www.pazugames.com/
